#summary Currently supported mechanisms

The following mechanisms have been tested and are known to work:
  * DIGEST-MD5 (AFP)
  * CRAM-MD5

These mechanisms have not been fully tested yet:
  * SMB-NTLMv2
  * SMB-NT
  * SMB-LAN-MANAGER
  * MS-CHAPv2
  * PPS
  * OTP
  * GSSAPI
  * WEBDAV-DIGEST
  * DHX
  * APOP

These mechanisms are known to not work yet:
  * WEBDAV-DIGEST (iChat server, Address Book, iCal, Wiki, Collaboration Services)
